translations: n．敲诈者，勒索者：通过威胁揭露某人的秘密或对某人进行伤害来索取钱财或其他利益的人。
· The victim decided to report the blackmailers to the police.
受害者决定向警方举报这些敲诈者。

sentences.sentence: Many manufacturers have policies to protect themselves against blackmailers.
sentences.translation: 许多制造商都有为敲诈勒索保险的保单。

sentences.sentence: The blackmailers bled him for every penny he had.
sentences.translation: 勒索者打算向他榨取更多的钱。

sentences.sentence: Those blackmailers intended to squeeze more money out of him.
sentences.translation: 那些恐吓者打算向他榨取更多的钱。
